p: Environmental ethics is the study of environmental issues from an ethical perspective. Since environmental protection has become a manifestation in today’s society, many fitnessers are committed to environmental protection initiatives and are proud of being environmentalists. They are eager to learn more about environmental protection and hope to protect the environment better. They “feel better right now” when they have hedonic goals ( Lindenberg and Steg, 2007). They feel that they are doing their part for environmental protection when they eat green and, therefore, feel happy inside.
